text:
e="preserve">LockWiper is an iOS application developed by iMyFone. It enables users to remove various locks from iPhone, iPad, iPod touch devices. LockWiper can remove the Apple ID without a password, remove the iPhone passcode, and it can also bypass the MDM activation screen & remove MDM Profile from iPhones.
According to its website, the iMyFone LockWiper app can "remove iPhone passcode from locked, disabled, broken screen" and "quickly bypass Screen Time or Restrictions passcode without data loss."
